name: Winter Ember (itch)
description:
This game was made for the Winter Break Game Jam 2022 with my new formed team Pandemonium Productions.

Controls In: 

E to Interact with objects 

R to shoot out FireBall Projectile 

Hold Shift: To Run 

Double Space: Burst Jump

In one cold winter, a small fire spirit is set out on its journey to grandma's stove to heat up everything in her house. Play as the fire spirit through the struggles of frozen lakes, things that are blocking the path, and many more!

All of the assets, coding and animation are made by us except for the sound which is from freesound.org

Credits to :
